name: HoverCab
description:
HoverCab is made by three 3rd. semester students of the S4G School for Games in Berlin.
We are all enrolled in the Game Development class, split up into two devs and one producer.
HoverCab was made in about five month (around 240 hours of work) with the goal to create a simplistic but fun arcade-like taxi game, inspired by the game Spacetaxi form 1984.

For more information please feel free to visit our website:

http://hovercab.school4games.net/

We hope you have fun and enjoy our game! We would greatly appreciate your feedback!
